name: Luke Jenkinson
relationship: Worked with Craig but at different companies
content: Craig's expertise in workplace wellness and mental health is second to none. He's one of those rare professionals who genuinely walks the walk when it comes to helping teams thrive. I've seen firsthand how his approach transforms not just individuals, but entire organizational cultures. His ability to blend strategic thinking with genuine empathy makes him invaluable to any business serious about employee wellbeing.
